    Round x up if x-floor(x) >= threshold

    Divisor method rounding up

    divisor_floor()

    Divisor method rounding down

    Divisor method geometric rounding

    Divisor method harmonic rounding

    divisor_round()

    Divisor method standard rounding

    divisors()

    Get district and party divisors

    Example data from the Finnish parliamentary elections (2019)

    Highest averages method

    Highest averages method

    pivot_to_df()

    Pivot wide matrix to long data.frame

    pivot_to_matrix()

    Pivot long data.frame to wide matrix

    proporz()

    Proportional Apportionment

    pukelsheim()

    Biproportional apportionment with data frames

    quorum_all()

    Create a quorum function where all quorums must be reached

    quorum_any()

    Create a quorum function where at least one quorum must be reached

    quota_largest_remainder()

    Largest remainder method

    reached_quorum_any_district()

    Check if lists/parties have reached a quorum in at least one district

    reached_quorum_total()

    Check if lists/parties have reached the quorum for all votes

    reached_quorums()

    Apply a list of quorum functions to a votes matrix

    run_app()

    Use biproportional apportionment interactively in a shiny app

    Calculate upper apportionment
